member.name: P:NuGet.Repositories.LocalPackageInfo.Nuspec
member.summary: Caches the nuspec reader. If the nuspec does not exist this will throw a friendly exception.

member.name: T:NuGet.Repositories.NuGetv3LocalRepository
member.summary: Caches package info from the global packages folder in memory. Packages not yet in the cache will be retrieved from disk.

member.name: M:NuGet.Repositories.NuGetv3LocalRepository.ClearCacheForIds(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Remove cached results for the given ids. This is needed after installing a new package.

member.name: T:NuGet.Shared.HashCodeCombiner
member.summary: Hash code creator, based on the original NuGet hash code combiner/ASP hash code combiner implementations

member.name: M:NuGet.Shared.HashCodeCombiner.GetHashCode(System.Object[])
member.summary: Create a unique hash code for the given set of items
